name: The Way to Free Will
description:
The Way to Free Will

Have you ever wondered, do we have free will? If yes, then all the things are cause of some action, but if not, then the destiny is predetermined and our decisions would be worthless, because no matter our actions the destiny would be the same.

In this game the moral is no matter your decisions, your destiny is the same, but the way you go to that destiny is determined by you.

[[Submission for the Philosophy Game Jam 3]]
